page.title: 03HISTORIC HOUSES
page.content: {Prebendal House} This is the{oldest house}in the village,being{779 years old.}The thickest wall is{7 feet.}Prebendal House was the residence for the priest who held the stall in York Minster Choir belonging to the{Prebend of {Wistow. {Milford Hall} Milford hall looks like a large {Manor house}from the outside.It is now a country club,with a red carpeted bar and red velvet chairs.There is a very wide{carved staircase}and a large {stone fireplace {Monk Fryston Hall } Built{6 hundred years}ago,the hall was owned by the Hemsworth family, then the{Duke of Rutland}and has been a hotel since 1947.It is built of grey stone,with mullioned,transomed windows.There was a{private zoo.
